Alternative graph patterns
@prefix dc10:  <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.0/> .
@prefix dc11:  <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> .
_:a  dc10:title     "SPARQL Query Language Tutorial" .

PREFIX dc10:  <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.0/>
PREFIX dc11:  <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
SELECT ?title
WHERE  { { ?book dc10:title  ?title } UNION 
{ ?book dc11:title  ?title } }
title
"SPARQL Protocol Tutorial" 
"SPARQL" 
"SPARQL (updated)" 
"SPARQL Query Language Tutorial" 
SELECT ?x ?y
WHERE  { { ?book dc10:title ?x } UNION 
{ ?book dc11:title ?y } }
x
y
"SPARQL (updated)"
{ ?book dc11:title ?y } }
SELECT ?title ?author
WHERE 
{ { ?book dc10:title ?title . ?book dc10:creator ?author }
UNION
{ ?book dc11:title ?title . ?book dc11:creator ?author }}
"SPARQL Protocol Tutorial"
"SPARQL"
"SPARQL Query Language Tutorial" 
author
title
"Alice"
"SPARQL Protocol Tutorial"
“Bob”
"SPARQL Query Language Tutorial"

Patterns on named graphs
# Named graph: http://example.org/foaf/aliceFoaf
@prefix foaf:<http://.../foaf/0.1/> .
@prefix rdf:<http://.../1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .
@prefix rdfs:<http://.../2000/01/rdf-schema#> .
_:a  foaf:name     "Alice" .
:a  foaf:mbox     <mailto:alice@work.example> .
_
p
_:a  foaf:knows    _:b .
_:b  foaf:name     "Bob" .
_:b  foaf:mbox     <mailto:bob@work.example> .
_:b  foaf:nick     "Bobby" .
_:b  rdfs:seeAlso  <http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf> .
<http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf>
rdf:type      foaf:PersonalProfileDocument .
# Named graph: http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf
@prefix foaf:<http://.../foaf/0.1/> .
@prefix rdf:<http://
/1999/02/22 rdf syntax ns#>
@prefix rdf:<http://.../1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .
@prefix rdfs:<http://.../2000/01/rdf-schema#> .
_:z  foaf:mbox     <mailto:bob@work.example> .
_:z  rdfs:seeAlso  <http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf> .
_:z  foaf:nick     "Robert" .
<http://example.org/foaf/bobFoaf>
